about_the_game:
This is the Demo version of the Hop Skip and Thump game. Ten (10) levels are available so you can try the game.

Deceptively tricky, turn-based strategy game. You might beat Skip on his own, but are you smart enough to win when the Thump monsters invade? Red, yellow, and green Thump monsters block your moves and "thump" you. What at first appears to be a simple game becomes way more challenging.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS HighSierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
